name: Cykra Ltd
description:
Since being established in 2014, Cykra Ltd has purely been in the business of developing HTML5 apps, websites and web solutions, and have accumulated a unique level of experience in the area. Further more, Cykra also offers most related services such as hosting, SEO and design.
Starting 2016, Cykra began the next part of its business strategy to establish itself as a world leading app and website developer in terms of architecture, quality and design.
With a client base in scandinavia, UK and Mauritius, Cykra is well versed in working with teams across borders and under the pressure of deadlines.
Cykra is a Danish owned and managed company located in Mauritius.
